thread.title: Bradley Cooper to Return to 'Limitless' TV Series on October 27
thread.title_full: Bradley Cooper to Return to 'Limitless' TV Series on October 27

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Bradley Cooper to Return to 'Limitless' TV Series on October 27
text:
Comments Senator Edward Morra is scheduled to pop up in the episode 'Side Effects May Include...' to air October 27. 
Bradley Cooper 's return to " Limitless " TV series has got a date. The executive producer is set to reprise his guest role as Senator Edward Morra in the episode "Side Effects May Include..." which will broadcast Tuesday, October 27 (10:00-11:00 PM, ET/PT). The news was announced by producer Craig Sweeny at New York Comic Con in New York City. Bringing the A-list actor back for the series was a challenge due to his hectic schedule. "We are subject to the whims of Bradley's schedule," Sweeny said. In the first episode, Morra provided Brian Finch ( Jake McDorman ) with a temporary inoculation from the severe side effects of the brain-enhancing drug NZT and hinted he had future plans for Brian. In his return, he demands a high price in exchange for another inoculation as Brian's physical and mental health begin to deteriorate again.
